oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: DeFord Bailey Performance - Tape 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 1 of 3. Recording from tape features DeFord Bailey (performer) performing on December 15, 1973.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: DeFord Bailey
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Ice Water Blues (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] [False Start] -- (00:47) Ice Water Blues (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] [False Start] -- (01:06) Ice Water Blues (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (04:29) Davidson County Blues (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (07:48) David Morton explains the tapes are being recorded at DeFord Bailey's apartment for Wilson Morton -- (08:15) Pan American Blues (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (10:09) It Ain't Gonna Rain No More (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (11:59) The Shoeshine Boy (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (13:41) Fox Chase (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (15:33) Bailey and Morton discuss which song to perform next -- (16:04) Ice Water Blues (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (17:46) Old Hen Cackle (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (20:22) Lost John (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental] -- (23:36) John Henry (DeFord Bailey) [French Harp instrumental]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bailey, DeFord; Bailey, DeFord, 1899-1982;
